entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is introduced as a pleasant and wise character who has come to visit Uncle Vernon. He is described as having a 'blatant wizardishness' about him.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who did not warn his friend that Dumbledore was coming.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is introduced as a character who is being visited by Dumbledore. He is described as having a 'vein pulsing in his temple'.

entities.name: agapanthuses
entities.description: Agapanthuses are mentioned as being flourishing in Uncle Vernon's house.

relationships.description: Dumbledore visits Uncle Vernon at his house.
Harry is a friend of Dumbledore's, as indicated by the fact that he did not warn him that Dumbledore was coming.
